sophiabcrypt.language

Class SbcDictionaryBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • sophiabcrypt.language.SbcDictionaryBase

  • public class SbcDictionaryBase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to create "LanguageFile.xml" by default program sentences. If LanguageFile.xml do not exists, it's created, else, the file is updated
    Since:
    October/2018
    Version:
    1.03.1
    Author:
    CesarBianchi
    See Also:
    SbcDictionarySentence, SbcDictionaryTranslations

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SbcDictionaryBase()
      This method is the same that of "Constructor of Class"
      SbcDictionaryBase(java.lang.String cDefinedLang)
      This method is the same that of "Constructor of Class" Sets the Language defined by user in Language attribute

        Parameters:
        cLanguageFile - The name of the xml file language
